name: The Library Text Adventure
description:
Welcome to The Library!

It's unfinished right now but here is what you can do as of now:

  • Talk to the old woman
  • Get card
  • Music

While short, I made sure to make it decently in-depth. I'm still coming up with an overall story, I have an idea but maybe as I write it, it'll develop.

Suggestions are always welcome!
